sqlMap.select: SELECT A.BIN_MemberInfoID FROM Members.BIN_MemberInfo A JOIN Members.BIN_MemCardInfo B ON A.BIN_MemberInfoID = B.BIN_MemberInfoID WHERE B.MemCode = #memCode# AND A.BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId# AND A.BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND A.MemInfoRegFlg = '0'
SELECT BindFlag AS bindFlag, MobilePhone AS mobilePhone FROM Members.BIN_MemberInfo WHERE BIN_MemberInfoID = #memberInfoId#
SELECT RegionNameChinese FROM Basis.BIN_StandardRegion WHERE BIN_RegionID = #regionId#
SELECT DefaultFlag FROM Members.BIN_MemberLevelDetail WHERE BIN_MemberLevelID = #memberLevel#

SELECT A.BIN_MemberInfoID AS memberInfoId, A.MemInfoRegFlg AS memInfoRegFlg, A.MemberLevel AS memberLevel, C.LevelName AS levelName, D.BIN_AddressInfoID AS addressInfoId, A.Version AS version, A.BirthYear AS birthYear, A.BirthDay AS birthDay, A.ReferrerID AS referrerId, A.MemberPassword AS memberPassword FROM Members.BIN_MemberInfo A JOIN Members.BIN_MemCardInfo B ON A.BIN_MemberInfoID = B.BIN_MemberInfoID LEFT JOIN Members.BIN_MemberLevel C ON A.MemberLevel = C.BIN_MemberLevelID LEFT JOIN Members.BIN_MemberAddress D ON A.BIN_MemberInfoID = D.BIN_MemberInfoID WHERE B.MemCode = #memCode# AND A.BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId# AND A.BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId#
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE Members.BIN_MemberInfo SET Name = #memName#, Nickname = #nickname#, CreditRating = #creditRating#, TencentQQ = #tencentQQ#, Email = #email#, MobilePhone = #mobilePhone#, Telephone = #telephone#, BirthYearGetType = #memAgeGetMethod#, BirthYear = #birthYear#, BirthDay = #birthDay#, JoinDate = #joinDate#, JoinTime = #joinTime#, BIN_EmployeeID = #employeeId#, BaCodeBelong = #employeeCode#, BIN_OrganizationID = #organizationId#, CounterCodeBelong = #organizationCode#,
MemberLevel = #memberLevel#, LevelStatus = #levelStatus#, LevelAdjustDay = #levelAdjustDay#,
TmallMixMobile = #tmallMixMobile#,
IsSameMobile = #isSameMobile#,
Memo1 = #memo1#, Memo2 = #memo2#, MemInfoRegFlg = '0', MemInfoRegDate = GETDATE(), Gender = #gender#, IdentityCard = #identityCard#, MaritalStatus = #maritalStatus#, ReferrerID = #referrerId#, IsReceiveMsg = #isReceiveMsg#, Active = #active#, ActiveDate = #activeDate#, ActiveChannel = #activeChannel#, MemType = #memType#, BlogId = #blogId#, MessageId = #messageId#, TestType = #testType#, Profession = #profession#, ConnectTime = #connectTime#, MemberPassword = #memberPassword#, Version = '1', ValidFlag = '1', DataSource1 = #dataSource1#, DataSource2 = #dataSource2#, DataSource3 = #dataSource3#, OrigJoinDate = #joinDate#, OrigEmployeeID = #employeeId#, OrigBaCodeBelong = #employeeCode#, OrigOrganizationID = #organizationId#, OrigCounterCodeBelong = #organizationCode#, WechatBindTime=#wechatBindTime#,
FirstUpTime = #firstUpTime#,
WHERE BIN_MemberInfoID = #memberInfoId#

UPDATE Members.BIN_MemCardInfo SET BaCode = #employeeCode#, CounterCode = #organizationCode#, GrantDate = #grantDate#, CardValidFlag = '1', CardCount = #cardCount#, PointMoveFlag = '1',
WHERE MemCode = #memCode# AND BIN_MemberInfoID = #memberInfoId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT B.MemCode AS memCode FROM Members.BIN_MemberInfo A JOIN Members.BIN_MemCardInfo B ON A.BIN_MemberInfoID = B.BIN_MemberInfoID AND B.CardValidFlag = '1' WHERE A.MobilePhone = #mobilePhone# AND A.BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId# AND A.BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND A.MemInfoRegFlg = '0'

SELECT top 1 A.BIN_OrganizationID FROM Basis.BIN_CounterInfo A WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE A.CounterCode = #organizationCode# AND A.BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId# AND A.BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId#
SELECT top 1 A.BIN_EmployeeID FROM Basis.BIN_Employee A WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE A.EmployeeCode = #employeeCode# AND A.BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId# AND A.BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId#

SELECT top 1 B.BIN_MemberClubID AS mClubId, B.ClubCode AS mClubCode FROM Members.BIN_MemClubCounter A JOIN Members.BIN_MemberClub B ON (A.ClubCode = B.ClubCode) WHERE A.CounterCode = #organizationCode# AND A.BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND A.BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId# AND A.ValidFlag = '1'
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM Members.BIN_MemClubLevel WITH(nolock) WHERE BIN_MemberInfoID = #memberInfoId# AND BIN_MemberClubID = #mClubId#
